section.title: Web search query: application/x-carrot-clustering-input-query
section.para: This format provides user query and the number of requested results embedded in an &xml; file. The main application of this format is for wrapping search engines and other data sources working on the paradigm of textual user queries and a list of matching results.
Input attribute requested-results may not be respected by input components and is only a hint as to how many results the client wants from the input component.
query element is required and must not be empty.
